import{clsx}from"clsx";import{twMerge}from"tailwind-merge";export function cn(){for(var _len=arguments.length,inputs=new Array(_len),_key=0;_key<_len;_key++){inputs[_key]=arguments[_key];}return twMerge(clsx(inputs));}// Format MATIC values
export function formatBNB(value){return parseFloat(value).toFixed(4);}// Alias for backward compatibility
export const formatMATIC=formatBNB;// Format percentage
export function formatPercentage(value){return"".concat(parseFloat(value).toFixed(2),"%");}// Calculate odds from pools
export function calculateOdds(outcomePool,totalPool){if(totalPool===0)return 0;return(outcomePool/totalPool*100).toFixed(2);}// Format time remaining
export function formatTimeRemaining(timestamp){const now=Date.now();const diff=timestamp-now;if(diff<=0)return"Ended";const days=Math.floor(diff/(1000*60*60*24));const hours=Math.floor(diff%(1000*60*60*24)/(1000*60*60));const minutes=Math.floor(diff%(1000*60*60)/(1000*60));if(days>0)return"".concat(days,"d ").concat(hours,"h");if(hours>0)return"".concat(hours,"h ").concat(minutes,"m");return"".concat(minutes,"m");}// Shorten wallet address
export function shortenAddress(address){if(!address)return"";return"".concat(address.slice(0,6),"...").concat(address.slice(-4));}// Mock wallet connection
export function mockWalletConnect(){return{address:"0x742d35Cc6634C0532925a3b844Bc9e7595f0bEb0",balance:"2.5432",connected:true};}
